binaryArithmetic - Class in <Unnamed>
This Class is use for do binary arithmetic ( sum , subtraction , multiply , divide , 1st and 2nh complement )
binaryArithmetic() - Constructor for class binaryArithmetic
 
binaryArithmetic.Complement - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a inner class of binaryArithmetic class.
It use for find a 1st and 2nd complement
binarySubtraction(String, String) - Method in class binaryArithmetic
This method is use for fine a answer for Subtraction between 2 binary number.
BitWise - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is use for handle a Bitwise operator ( and , or , xor , bit wise inversion , left - right shift )
BitWise() - Constructor for class BitWise
 
BitWise() - Static method in class Main
 
bitwiseInversion(int) - Method in class BitWise
This method is use for find the inversion for a integer value.
It convert a parameter to 2nd complement.
